message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. I'm asking for $14,000 for it.  I think this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your enthusiasm. However, I am only able to commit to a budget of $12,000 for this purchase.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $13,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort, but I still can't go beyond $12,000 for this product.
